Key Match Events: Sri Lanka won by 8 wickets (with 146 balls remaining)

Lahiru Kumara took 3/35 and was awarded the Player of the Match

Chris Woakes was caught for 0 runs
David Willey was not out for 14 runs

Adil Rashid was run out for 2 runs
Pre-Game Insights: England elected to bat first after winning the toss
Pathum Nissanka and Sadeera Samarawickrama were expected to be key players for Sri Lanka
Post-Match Reflections: Lahiru Kumara expressed his delight at being awarded the Player of the Match
No quotes from the England players or coaches
No announcements of retirements or long-term impacts
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the M Chinnaswamy Stadium in Bengaluru
The umpires for the match were Adrian Holdstock and Chris Brown

Others: The match was part of the ICC Cricket World Cup 2023-24
Sri Lanka earned 2 points and England earned 0 points
